q: Egypt's top archaeologist, Zahi Hawass , told state television Egyptians on the street had tried to protect the building, but that the looters had entered from above. Two mummies on display had been damaged. I felt deeply sorry... when I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night, Zahi Hawass , chairman of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said. The museum is adjacent to the headquarters of the ruling National Democratic Party that protesters set ablaze during protests. Smoke was still rising from the

Your Own Boss in 12 Months.`` You have to figure out whether your ego can take bringing another person to the table who's really making decisions that affect your business,'' Eric Schmidt says. Not only do you have to have clearly defined roles for you and your new manager, but you have to make sure those roles are clear to everyone at your company. You don't want employees pitting you and the new manager against each other, or coming to you in hopes of getting a different answer than what they heard from the new executive. It

`` What I hope is that Kelsey and I can improve our communications and truly co-parent our two wonderful children,'' her statement said. She also wished her ex and his fiancee, Kayte Walsh , love and happiness in their new marriage. Those are the kinds of good wishes that only a dollar sign followed by a lot of zeroes buys. Kelsey told David Letterman last month that he plans to marry Kayte Walsh this month.
